channel.title: Runescape have more users than wow?!
channel.description:
runescape have more users than wow??! impossible? no, but improbable.
ive been reasearching a bit on rs to findout if rs 3 is comming then i googled andrew gower, and found out there is 9 count them 9 million+ registeret users on rs, whike wow only have 7 million+ registered users. what???????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????

item.title: Runescape have more users than wow?!
item.dc:creator: @Thor38283828 Thor38283828
item.description:
@Thor38283828 wrote:

I must admit i play runescape instead of WOW now but that’s because they droped my price to $15 while i can pay $5 for runescape. Also runescape levels up faster i found out. You could be lv 123 (i am) when im only lv 34 on WOW in about 1 - 2 years. (depending on how much you play)

Read full topic

if you ask me its not possible to die of playing computer. my friends mum boyfriend (hes 50 or like) plays more than 12 hours wow a day and more if he can. hes an insane pc player, first it was lvl ??? in everquest then lvl 99 hardcore diablo then 100+ runescape and now wow.

item.title: Runescape have more users than wow?!
item.dc:creator: @apzrman apzrman
item.description:
@apzrman wrote:

[quote=“lothy, post:23, topic:63368”][quote author=apzrman link=topic=91727.msg1004579#msg1004579 date=1173717718]

Am i the only WoW fan? :|[br][size=1]Posted on: March 12, 2007, 05:34:56 AM[/size][hr][quote author=Melissa T link=topic=91727.msg975056#msg975056 date=1173129966]

Runescape is free to play, WoW, is 20$ a month to watch pixeles.

And LOT people dies cuz of that game ,
They forget to eat they dont get normal air they are just freaked on that game :S

Overreacting lol…
[/quote]
oh he’s not overreacting… some people (super pc nerds who make viruses 2hr per day, rest spent playing rpg games) die this way sometimes
[/quote]
Actually, she is. The media just blows everything out of proportion.
It’s like the guys, girls, and sex thing from American Pie. If a girl says she has had sex however many times, you multiply it by 3. If a guy says it, you divide by 3.
If the media says that 20 people have died due to excessive gaming, then your best bet is to divide it by at least 10, if not 20. In reality it would only be 1 or 2.

As for that little bit on viruses, it’s not true. Only idiots make viruses, and it takes absolutely no specialised skill.[/quote]
I ment those viruses that get into your mainframe and screw with the disk tray…

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape have more users than wow?!
item.dc:creator: @Eifel_65 Eifel 65
item.description:
@Eifel_65 wrote:

Lets Compare and Contrast, shall we?
WoW - Runescape

[ul][li]$20.00 A month - $5.00 A month.[/li]
[li]Very Good Graphics - Decent Graphics[/li]
[li]Map is huge - Map is Medium[/li]
[li]Online - Online[/li]
[li]Has Different Worlds - Has Different Worlds[/li][/ul]
Thats about all I can think of. I’d rather have Runescape though, a lot cheaper, anyone agree?

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape have more users than wow?!
item.dc:creator: @alexia alexia
item.description:
@alexia wrote:

They may have 9 million registered usernames, but each of those usernames are not controlled by a different person. The average RuneScape player probably has about 2-5 accounts, not just one. This is just a guess, but I think that at least 96% of those WoW usernames are different people.

-Alexia

Read full topic
